reviewText: Practical advice, very easy to follow. My back hurt doing some of these exercises at first, but I have built up strength and now I'll find it earier to get into and stay into correct hitting position, especially proper spine angle. Thank you Karen!

I liked this video. Basic stretches that were easy to follow with good pace to them. This is not a "killer workout", but that is why I liked it. It is golf specific to balance out those P90X sessions.

This is a simple, easy to follow, warm up and golf specific exercise DVD. The instruction is first rate and follows accepted work out routines with some yoga based core movements.  Suitable for any golfer.
